dmca.title: Landmark Education requests removal of link
dmca.body:
[Translation of letter in Dutch language.  I have attempted a word-for-word rather than a though-for-thought translation. The inaccurate reference to a "website" instead of a page on that site is in the original letter]


Honorable Mr. Hein,

My client, Landmark Education, has asked me to focus your attention on the following.

Landmark Education has had to notice that you, via your website http://www.apologeticsindex.org/l30.html (almost at the end of your website under the heading "multimedia"), have added a link to the CAIC [=Cult Awareness and Information Center] in Australia on which a link is found to a TV3 video.  The publication of this video results in a violation of the worldwide copyrights of my client since within it, without her permission, large portions of her copyright protected work the _Landmark Forum Manual_ are reproduced.  Landmark Education acts against violations of her copyright throughout the world.

Client hereby request that you [underdlined]immediately[/underlined] remove the link from your website. In good order I point out to you that if you do not remove the link you act unrightfully toward my client by - inasmuch as you do not commit copyright violation yourself - you in any case purposefully aid the copyright violation by third parties by not removing the mentioned link.  I would appreciate receiving, by Wednesday, November 15, 2006 at the latest, your written notice that you have removed the link.

Regards,

Van Doorne N.V.
Bas Pinkcaers
